boundary

(
  • times
)
SimplexGeometry

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:143

Applies the boundary operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The boundary operation converts simplices of dimension n to n - 1. For example, triangles are converted to lines.

Parameters:

  • times Number
    Determines the number of times the boundary operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

isModified

() Boolean

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:121

Used to determine whether the geometry must be recalculated. The base implementation is pessimistic and returns true. This method should be implemented by the derived class to reduce frequent recalculation.

Returns:

Boolean: if the parameters defining the geometry have been modified.

Sets the modification state of this instance. Derived classes should override this method if they contain parameters which affect geometry calculation.

Parameters:

  • modified Boolean
    The value that the modification state will be set to.

subdivide

(
  • times
)
SimplexGeometry

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:175

Applies the subdivide operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The subdivide operation creates new simplices of the same dimension as the originals.

Parameters:

  • times Number
    Determines the number of times the subdivide operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

Properties

_k

Number private

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:35

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

axis

Vector3

Inherited from AxialSimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/AxialSimplexGeometry.ts:11

The symmetry axis used for geometry generation.

curvedSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:42

Specifies the number of segments to use in curved directions.

data

Simplex[]

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:21

The geometry as a list of simplices. A simplex, in the context of WebGL, will usually represent a triangle, line or point.

flatSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:48

Specifies the number of segments to use on flat surfaces.

k

Number

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:95

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

The k parameter affects geometry generation.

k must be an integer.

meta

GeometryMeta

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:28

Summary information on the simplices such as dimensionality and sizes for attributes. This data structure may be used to map vertex attribute names to program names.

orientationColors

Boolean

Inherited from SimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexGeometry.ts:54

Specifies that the geometry should set colors on vertex attributes for visualizing orientation of triangles

sliceAngle

Number

Inherited from SliceSimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:17

The angle of the slice, measured in radians.

sliceStart

Vector3

Inherited from SliceSimplexGeometry: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:25

The (unit vector) direction of the start of the slice.

uuid

String

Inherited from Shareable: src/davinci-eight/utils/Shareable.ts:77
